string.value: #bScarrs#k says he has something to tell you.
You need to bring a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You brought a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to hand a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 4,200\r\nCan proceed to 'Over the Castle Walls (1)' quest\r\n
Oh, I almost forgot! What was I thinking? I need you to hand this #b#t4032389##k to #b#p1300004##k and report the results.

The #bSecretary of Magic#k asked me to bring him some of the #bKiller Spore Potion#k when it is complete. I'll give you the sample; now could you please deliver the sample to our #bSecretary of Magic#k?
It's not such a difficult task, so just come back to me when you're ready.
So is the #bKiller Spore Potion#k finally ready?
Okay, so this is the #bKiller Spore Potion#k. Thank you, thank you for bring this to me. Please send #bScarrs#k my deepest gratitude.
Please deliver this to the Secretary of Magic.
Unless you really need me from something, please don't try starting a conversation with me.
